title: Which Browser is Faster: Firefox or Chrome?
content:
Hello everyone,

I’ve been using Firefox and Chrome for my daily browsing activities and noticed some differences in their performance. I’m curious to know from the community's experience:

Which browser do you find faster overall, Firefox or Chrome? Are there specific scenarios where one outperforms the other (e.g., handling multiple tabs, streaming, running web apps, etc.)? Have any recent updates or features in either browser significantly improved their speed? Looking forward to your insights and experiences!

Thank you! CEO: bermudaunicorn.com
creator: businesslancing56

title: Lost my bookmarks on home computer.  Now on home computer i have all my work bookmarks.  Can i get my home computer bookmarks back?
content:
Now on home computer i have all my work bookmarks. Can i get my home computer bookmarks back?

I changed my sync settings to not sync now but old home bookmark did not show up when i looked in the manage bookmarks Library window. I selected restore and only the bookmarks since July 27 appear.

title: Hirefox and facebook messenger
content:
Have Firefox 131. When in FB messenger, when I share a post, the person I send it to gets a pic of the person who initially posted the link. When I click on the picture, it then shows the link I sent. This does not happen in Chrome, or on my Android phone. It only started when I upgraded from 90 something to 131. What gives?

Garry Schaffer
creator: Garrysch
